## Olives Idle Game Project

This is a Python Flask web application for an idle game called "Olives".

### Project Structure
- Flask backend server
- HTML/CSS/JavaScript frontend
- Simple idle game mechanics

### Development Guidelines
- Use Flask for serving the web application
- Keep the game logic in client-side JavaScript
- Follow Python PEP 8 style guidelines
- Use ES6+ JavaScript features

### Game Mechanics
- Player collects olives by pressing a button
- 3-second progress bar before earning each olive
- Button disabled during progress bar animation
